title: Charmed Life
description: "There is one absolute rule," said Chrestomanci. "No witchcraft of any kind is to be practised by children without supervision. Is that understood?"No witchcraft? Gwendolen Chant - a gifted witch in the making - has other ideas and is determined to get the better of the great enchanter. Her brother Cat, who has no magical gift, is powerless to stop her.
author: Diana Wynne Jones
